commodities.tests.technical
Class TechnicalTestAbstract

java.lang.Object
  commodities.tests.technical.TechnicalTestAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
TechnicalTestInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovingAverageExponentialTest, MovingAverageTest, MovingAverageTriangleTest, StochasticKDExponentialTest, StochasticKDTest, StochasticKDTriangleTest, StochasticTest
public abstract class TechnicalTestAbstract
extends Object
implements TechnicalTestInterface

The TechnicalTestAbstract implements the common methods of the TechnicalTestInterface. It also supplies methods for storing data to a database. REQUIREMENT FROM TechnicalTestInterface: All classes that extend this abstract must contain the following 2 constructors: Test() - Used for retrieving the name of the test ONLY! Test(commodities.dataaccess.Contract) - For all other accesses. This is required since the getName() method must be included in every class but is a static name that must also be used to populate the Test menu.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

getName

public String getName()
Retrieve the name of the test. This name will be the english style name that will appear in the menu and as a header for the graph.

Specified by:

graphResults

public abstract void graphResults()
This method will depict the results of the test. Although this will typically be in the form of a line graph, the graph can appear in any appropriate format.

Specified by:
graphResults in interface TechnicalTestInterface

removeExtraOptimizedStats

protected void removeExtraOptimizedStats(TreeMap tableByPercent,
                                         StatsAbstract[] statsArray)
Remove extra statistics that are too close to another that is more optimial. This prevents multiple statistics that are clumped together from all being reported.

Parameters:
tableByPercent - table of success percentages
statsArray - array of success statistics

saveOptimizedStats

public abstract void saveOptimizedStats(StatsAbstract[] statsArray)
Save the optimization tests.

Parameters:
statsArray - array of successful stats
